# WaveMaker AI Beta - Release date: 08 February 2026

There has major technical improvements and new features in WaveMaker AI.1.0 Beta. This release is intended for early adopters and developers who want to explore the latest capabilities of the WaveMaker pvfvlatform.

For details about the technology stack upgrades, refer to [Technology Stack](/tech-stack).

# WaveMaker AI Beta - Release date: 08 February 2026


There has major technical improvements and new features in WaveMaker AI.1.0 Beta. This release is intended for early adopters and developers who want to explore the latest capabilities of the WaveMaker platform.

For details about the technology stack upgrades, refer to [Technology Stack](/tech-stack).

<TabsWrapper>
  <TabItem name="Features">

## User Interfaces

- **[Design System](../../../design-system/concepts/index.mdx)** based projects üñ•Ô∏è üì±  
  Build web and mobile apps using design tokens and standardized component variants for consistent, scalable theming.  

- **[Auto Layout](../../../user-interfaces/web/develop/working-with-layouts/auto-layout)** for responsive UIs üñ•Ô∏è üì±  
  Create structured, responsive layouts visually with precise control over alignment, spacing, and sizing‚Äîwithout writing CSS.  

- **[Autocode](../../../design-system/figma-autocode-plugin/working-with-autocode-plugin.md)** for converting Design-to-code üñ•Ô∏è  
  Convert supported Figma designs into working WaveMaker applications with layouts, components, and tokens auto-generated.  

- **React code generation (Beta)** üñ•Ô∏è  
  Export WaveMaker web applications as production-ready React code using the same visual and AI-assisted workflows.  

---

## Backend

---

## Platform

- **AIRA ‚Äì AI agents for application development** üñ•Ô∏è  
  Use prompt-driven AI agents for API integration, backend creation, JavaScript generation, security configuration, and screenshot-to-code workflows.  
  ‚Üí [Documentation](../../../developing-with-agents/overview.md)

- **Style Workspace for design tokens** üñ•Ô∏è  
  Manage global and component-level design tokens, themes, and variants from a dedicated styling workspace.  
  ‚Üí [Documentation](../../../user-interfaces/web/develop/styling-with-design-tokens/working-with-style-workspace.mdx)


---

## Product Ecosystem

- **Reimagined documentation experience**  
  Documentation reorganized around developer personas and workflows, with deep linking across Academy and Storybook.  

- **WaveMaker Academy as a learning platform**  
  Mentor-led learning paths, updated videos, and certification-oriented programs for faster developer onboarding.  
  ‚Üí [Academy](https://academy.wavemaker.com)

- **Component Storybook for Web and Mobile**  
  Interactive component documentation with live property manipulation for React and React Native components.  
  ‚Üí [Web Storybook](https://react-components.wavemaker.ai)  
  ‚Üí [Mobile Storybook](https://reactnative-components.wavemaker.ai)

- **Product Marketplace for reusable assets**  
  Discover and reuse components, prefabs, connectors, design systems, and industry-specific solutions.  
  ‚Üí [Marketplace](https://marketplace.wavemaker.ai)

---

 </TabItem>
